Class Matrix

    • Matrix

  • public class Matrix
extends java.lang.Object
    Simulates a matrix

    1.11.18
    Author:
    Tony Yang

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      Matrix(double[][] mat)
      Creates a matrix of any dimension
